newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: Total NZ computer services sales up 18 pct in 1996.
newsitem.headline: Total NZ computer services sales up 18 pct in 1996.

text.p: Total computer services sales, including export sales, rose 18 percent to NZ$1.27 billion in the 1996 financial year, Statistics New Zealand said on Thursday.
Computer services export sales were up 57 percent to $63.2 million.
SNZ said its Information Technology (IT) Survey showed five of the seven IT commodites published experienced falls in export sales in the year.
Total computer services and software exports were $121.7 million in the year.
Sales of single-user systems to New Zealanders for their own use grew five percent in the year, against a 44 percent rise in the 1995 financial year.
